table_caption: Topological parameters of brain functional networks used in this study.
table_foot: (Notes: Cp: clustering coefficient; Lp: characteristic path length; Eloc: local efficiency; Eglob: global efficiency; S, K: sparsity (S) and wiring cost (K); a: a scalar parameter, a; Kc: a cutoff degree, Kc; Knodal: degree of a node; Cp-nodal: nodal cluster coefficient; Eloc-nodal: nodal local efficiency; Enodal: nodal efficiency).
